name: In re ESTATE OF J. Bolton WINPENNY, II. In re ESTATE OF Susan G. S. WINPENNY. Appeals of Carol WINPENNY

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: In re ESTATE OF J. Bolton WINPENNY, II. In re ESTATE OF Susan G. S. WINPENNY. Appeals of Carol WINPENNY.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Decrees affirmed.
Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Bernard M. Berman, Media, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
434 A.2d 716
In re ESTATE OF J. Bolton WINPENNY, II. In re ESTATE OF Susan G. S. WINPENNY. Appeals of Carol WINPENNY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 27, 1981.
Decided Sept. 24, 1981.
Carol Winpenny, in pro. per.
Bernard M. Berman, Media, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
